description:
Hajime has been given a three-day suspension due to beating Jyugo at the New Year’s Tournament. Momoko orders Kenshirou, Kiji, and Samon to take turns covering for Hajime.
But Uno, Nico, and Rock do whatever they want as usual. 
The three supervisors constantly struggle to maintain order with the three troublemakers.
Finally, after three days, Jyugo is back...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Melancholy Day for the Dog, Monkey, and Pheasant
Inu Saru Kiji no Yuuutsu na Ichinichi
La journée mélancolique du chien, du singe et du faisan
犬・猿・雉の憂鬱な一日
